DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate pharmacokinetics XR quetiapine fumarate ( 300mg,600mg , 800mg once-daily ) Chinese schizophrenic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Quetiapine Fumarate Chinese Schizophrenic Patients
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 60 year inclusive Schizophrenia diagnosis Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2027 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Provision write informed consent initiation study AIDS & hepatitis B History seizure disorder History episodic , idiopathic orthostatic hypotension
DOC.keyword: quetiapine fumarate ( SEROQUEL ) extended-release ( XR ) China PK Study
